properties.entry: SELECT PICKED_NUM, PICKED_DATE, USER_NO, SPACE_NO FROM PICKED WHERE USER_NO = ? AND SPACE_NO = ?
INSERT INTO PICKED ( PICKED_NUM, USER_NO, SPACE_NO ) VALUES (SEQ_PNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ? )
SELECT P.SPACE_NO, SPACE_NAME, SPACE_TAG, SPACE_ADDRESS, SPACE_PRICE, SPACE_MIMG, SPACE_CAPACITY FROM SPACE S JOIN PICKED P ON (S.SPACE_NO=P.SPACE_NO) WHERE P.USER_NO = ?
DELETE FROM PICKED WHERE SPACE_NO = ? AND USER_NO = ?
